Description: Blue glazed composition cosmetic container with a separate lid, made in the shape of a column capital. The box is divided into three compartments inside. It is glazed pale blue except for some decorative lines at the base and a peg (for fastening the lid) at the top, which are dark blue. The cover has a flat pale blue underside but an elaborate upper surface reproducing the foliate design of a column capital. Floral patterns at the base and vertical lines and buds near the top are glazed dark blue, as is a peg at the top, made to align with the one in the box. At the base is a perforation which matches one in the box and was used for a swivel-pin fixing.
